name: git2prov
description: Unleash the potential of Git in the new W3C standard for provenance.
author: Tom De Nies
Sara Magliacane
Ruben Verborgh

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -i -g Integration --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -i -g Integration --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
